Description.Text: Art 'Otel is a traditional 4-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Sofia. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining, a sauna and an excellent location next to the National Palace of Culture. Sofia is a treasure trove of fine architecture, fascinating history and rich culture. Nearby places of interest include the Sveta Nedelya Square, the Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and the National Art Gallery. NDK metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Sofia destinations. The hotel occupies a mid-rise building featuring Neoclassical architecture. Facilities include a sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are simply decorated with warm tones and carpeted floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, cable TV, a safe, mini-bar, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The Art restaurant offers local and international cuisine in an elegant space with modern murals, whilst guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the adjoining bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
